Think about it ğŸ™

You're not alone â™¥ï¸

Good on you. Honestly. Sometime, "friends" like these take advantage of you and use you as an outlet for their emotions. 

Good luck ğŸ™

Can't really give and advice, but try speaking to random ppl.

I've done this at a mall, with cashiers or mall attendants (male and female). It gets you over the initial awkwardness.

Build yourself up from there.

Good luck, bucko.
Who's putting this pressure on you?

I had the unfortunate chance to meet a shadow being or two.

Both were demonic-looking and terrifying.

Fuck. 

Never again, I hope ğŸ‘½
Good on you â™¥ï¸
I'm in.

You have to try and be the better person. Don't be a means to someone else's end. 

Stay strong â™¥ï¸
Exactly.
That happens. Like anything in life keep at it, work through he frustrating parts and you'll get there eventually ğŸ‘½

Same! (Minus the dog).

I've been able to be semi lucid before, but haven't been successful in a while.

I took a nap yesterday afternoon and BAM, lucid dream last night.
Same.

Hello â™¥ï¸

All I can say is that you aren't alone. Though I wasn't in the same environment, I experience things almost the same as you do. Tbh, I thought I was broken, but soon realised it was the world, not me.

Do you ever just wonder about existence, in general and the existence (experience) of others?

If you want to talk, I would be more than happy to listen ğŸ™ğŸ½

Firstly. Don't let other perceptions of your "looks" determine how you feel about yourself. It's all fucked. Ppl think we all start life in some sort of RPG character creator and we have control.over how we look. It's all utter bullshit.

You're not alone, friend. Live YOUR life, by YOUR values. Fuck what other people think, honestly.

You are loved, regardless â™¥ï¸

Honestly speaking, just try and move on, if that's the way they treated you. 

You don't deserve to be treated like shit for trying to apologise.

Hope it works out â™¥ï¸

Will power and determination. Self awareness. Take note of how you're feeling just before or after you start craving.

My drastic approach was to throw away ALL (and I mean, all) of my weed and smoking kit. 

Then, the hard part is not buying more. 

Good luck â™¥ï¸

Yup, but not to such an extent. 

I became aware that my chest felt heavier (even hurt a bit) after my 3rd day clean. I'm a bit further on now and the feeling is gone entirely. 

Maybe give it more time?

Good luck â™¥ï¸

I understand completely ğŸ™ğŸ½

Day 2 is closer to day 3 and so on. You got this, friend â™¥ï¸

Hello friend.

Don't judge your life on what you see on social media. That shit isn't real. If you're into meditation, try and think on that and you'll realise it for yourself.

Stay strong â™¥ï¸

I'm in the same situation. 

I'm awkward, bordering on creepy and ppl definitely pick that up.

I'm in the same boat, friend. 

+1 for any suggestions.
Stay strong, fellow wanderer!
Thank you ğŸ™ğŸ½ I'm on day 5 and already feeling a bit better.

I was, a few days back. Keep telling yourself that you don't need it to function (much like a mantra).

You'll start rationalizing all the thoughts which make it ok  to stay smoking again, but I truly believe you'll get thought it. 

You've got this.
Thanks for sharing this, I know how difficult it can be. Please know that you aren't alone â™¥ï¸

Same here, mate. I really like how you described it as, not caring in the moment. 

It's exactly how I feel.

Any thoughts on how to get past it?
Thank you ğŸ™ğŸ½

I've tried getting into a routine of cleaning, meditating, reading and exercise.

It's boring, but you'll feel better and time will have passed somewhat.
I hope to see change.
I agree with this wanderer.

Thanks for replying!

Thanks for making the effort to reply! This is quite  insightful.

Peace ğŸ™ğŸ½
Thanks! I've already done an initial read-through of the Kybalion .

Sorry, sir, I may have missed this earlier.

Do they intend on helping us? I believe, as a species, we've completely lost the plot, somewhere along the way. 

Are they going to let us find our own way?  Whether that results in our own destruction or, preferably, in our salvation/enlightenment, does it really matter to them?
Why do you do this?
Why am I hearing Scooby Doo?
I would've asked for a Cuban sandwhich, on the spot.

People don't want to take that responsibility, personally.

But, I sincerely hope you'll get through whatever it is you're experiencing.

You're not alone â™¥ï¸
You're not alone ğŸ™ğŸ½
